testcase.name: Gill clicks the cookie button 1 times and buys 1 factories

Mary clicks the cookie button 25 times and buys 2 factories

failure.message: Locator expected not to have text: 0 Received: 0 Call log: - Assert "hasText" with timeout 5000ms - waiting for locator("#factories").first() 9 × locator resolved to 0 - unexpected value "0"
